colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN ZHES BYA BA @003B 'DI NI DAD BRTZON SLOB BU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^DAM PA'I MING CAN GYIS HOR ZLA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BRGYAD LA 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MKHAN MING BLO BZANG RTEN 'BREL BKRA SHIS SO,, DE YANG, MING SPEL MTSAMS 'DIR, RANG GANG MOS KYI RTZA BA'I BLA MA'I MTSAN BCUG PAS KYANG LEGS PAR 'GYUR RO,, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG SKYE DANG SKYE BAR RJE BTZUN BLA MA DGYES BZHIN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O,, ,,)
